title: Pulled beef and pork baps
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons vegetable oil', '2kg bone-in beef roasting joint', '900g boneless pork shoulder roast', '475ml water', '1 (570g) bottle ketchup', '2 tablespoons prepared mustard', '2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', 'salt and pepper to taste', '15 buns or baps, split', '150g chopped onion', '125g chopped gherkins']
